item.description: It’s not unfair to call Microsoft a reactive company, i.e. they follow trends and build on others innovations, it’s in their history. item.title: Google music is finally here
item.author: Jason Parmar,
item.description: I used to use browser based music services “Grooveshark” & “Hypem” in addition to downloading to fulfil my musical listening needs. item.title: Will W8 cause us grief?
item.author: Jason Parmar,Yong Wen Chua,
item.description: Some of us are not normal people (but then again, we are Imperial students).
